00042 static inline void ahrs_update_mag_full(void);
00043 static inline void ahrs_update_mag_2d(void);

00045 
00046 /* in place quaternion first order integration with constante rotational velocity */
00047 /*  */
00048 #define INT32_QUAT_INTEGRATE_FI(_q, _hr, _omega, _f) {      \
00049     _hr.qi += -_omega.p*_q.qx - _omega.q*_q.qy - _omega.r*_q.qz;  \
00050     _hr.qx +=  _omega.p*_q.qi + _omega.r*_q.qy - _omega.q*_q.qz;  \
00051     _hr.qy +=  _omega.q*_q.qi - _omega.r*_q.qx + _omega.p*_q.qz;  \
00052     _hr.qz +=  _omega.r*_q.qi + _omega.q*_q.qx - _omega.p*_q.qy;  \
00053                   \
00054     ldiv_t _div = ldiv(_hr.qi, ((1<<INT32_RATE_FRAC)*_f*2));    \
00055     _q.qi+= _div.quot;              \
00056     _hr.qi = _div.rem;              \
00057                   \
00058     _div = ldiv(_hr.qx, ((1<<INT32_RATE_FRAC)*_f*2));     \
00059     _q.qx+= _div.quot;              \
00060     _hr.qx = _div.rem;              \
00061                   \
00062     _div = ldiv(_hr.qy, ((1<<INT32_RATE_FRAC)*_f*2));     \
00063     _q.qy+= _div.quot;              \
00064     _hr.qy = _div.rem;              \
00065                   \
00066     _div = ldiv(_hr.qz, ((1<<INT32_RATE_FRAC)*_f*2));     \
00067     _q.qz+= _div.quot;              \
00068     _hr.qz = _div.rem;              \
00069                   \
00070   }
00071

00074 struct AhrsIntCmpl ahrs_impl;
00075 
00076 static inline void compute_imu_quat_and_rmat_from_euler(void);
00077 static inline void compute_imu_euler_and_rmat_from_quat(void);
00078 static inline void compute_body_orientation(void);
00079 
00080 void ahrs_init(void) {
00081 
00082   ahrs.status = AHRS_UNINIT;
00083 
00084   /* set ltp_to_body to zero */
00085   INT_EULERS_ZERO(ahrs.ltp_to_body_euler);
00086   INT32_QUAT_ZERO(ahrs.ltp_to_body_quat);
00087   INT32_RMAT_ZERO(ahrs.ltp_to_body_rmat);
00088   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs.body_rate);
00089 
00090   /* set ltp_to_imu so that body is zero */
00091   QUAT_COPY(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat, imu.body_to_imu_quat);
00092   RMAT_COPY(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, imu.body_to_imu_rmat);
00093   INT32_EULERS_OF_RMAT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_euler, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat);
00094   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs.imu_rate);
00095 
00096   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs_impl.gyro_bias);
00097   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs_impl.rate_correction);
00098   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias);
00099 
00100 }
00101 
00102 void ahrs_align(void) {
00103 
00104   /* Compute an initial orientation using euler angles */
00105   ahrs_int_get_euler_from_accel_mag(&ahrs.ltp_to_imu_euler, &ahrs_aligner.lp_accel, &ahrs_aligner.lp_mag);
00106   /* Convert initial orientation in quaternion and rotation matrice representations. */
00107   compute_imu_quat_and_rmat_from_euler();
00108 
00109   compute_body_orientation();
00110 
00111   /* Use low passed gyro value as initial bias */
00112   RATES_COPY( ahrs_impl.gyro_bias, ahrs_aligner.lp_gyro);
00113   RATES_COPY( ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, ahrs_aligner.lp_gyro);
00114   INT_RATES_LSHIFT(ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, 28);
00115 
00116   ahrs.status = AHRS_RUNNING;
00117 
00118 }

00122 /*
00123  *
00124  *
00125  *
00126  */
00127 void ahrs_propagate(void) {
00128 
00129   /* unbias gyro             */
00130   struct Int32Rates omega;
00131   RATES_DIFF(omega, imu.gyro_prev, ahrs_impl.gyro_bias);
00132 
00133   /* low pass rate */
00134 #ifdef AHRS_PROPAGATE_LOW_PASS_RATES
00135   RATES_SMUL(ahrs.imu_rate, ahrs.imu_rate,2);
00136   RATES_ADD(ahrs.imu_rate, omega);
00137   RATES_SDIV(ahrs.imu_rate, ahrs.imu_rate, 3);
00138 #else
00139   RATES_COPY(ahrs.imu_rate, omega);
00140 #endif
00141 
00142   /* add correction     */
00143   RATES_ADD(omega, ahrs_impl.rate_correction);
00144   /* and zeros it */
00145   INT_RATES_ZERO(ahrs_impl.rate_correction);
00146 
00147   /* integrate quaternion */
00148   INT32_QUAT_INTEGRATE_FI(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat, ahrs_impl.high_rez_quat, omega, AHRS_PROPAGATE_FREQUENCY);
00149   INT32_QUAT_NORMALIZE(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat);
00150 
00151   compute_imu_euler_and_rmat_from_quat();
00152 
00153   compute_body_orientation();
00154 
00155 }

00160 void ahrs_update_accel(void) {
00161 
00162   struct Int32Vect3 c2 = { RMAT_ELMT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, 0,2),
00163          RMAT_ELMT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, 1,2),
00164          RMAT_ELMT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, 2,2)};
00165   struct Int32Vect3 residual;
00166 #ifdef AHRS_GRAVITY_UPDATE_COORDINATED_TURN
00167   // FIXME: check overflow ?
00168   const struct Int32Vect3 Xdd_imu = {
00169     0,
00170      ((ahrs_impl.ltp_vel_norm>>INT32_ACCEL_FRAC) * ahrs.imu_rate.r)
00171     >>(INT32_SPEED_FRAC+INT32_RATE_FRAC-INT32_ACCEL_FRAC-INT32_ACCEL_FRAC),
00172     -((ahrs_impl.ltp_vel_norm>>INT32_ACCEL_FRAC) * ahrs.imu_rate.q)
00173     >>(INT32_SPEED_FRAC+INT32_RATE_FRAC-INT32_ACCEL_FRAC-INT32_ACCEL_FRAC)
00174   };
00175   struct Int32Vect3 corrected_gravity;
00176   VECT3_DIFF(corrected_gravity, imu.accel, Xdd_imu);
00177   INT32_VECT3_CROSS_PRODUCT(residual, corrected_gravity, c2);
00178 #else
00179   INT32_VECT3_CROSS_PRODUCT(residual, imu.accel, c2);
00180 #endif
00181 
00182   // residual FRAC : ACCEL_FRAC + TRIG_FRAC = 10 + 14 = 24
00183   // rate_correction FRAC = RATE_FRAC = 12
00184   // 2^12 / 2^24 * 5e-2 = 1/81920
00185   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.p += -residual.x/82000;
00186   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.q += -residual.y/82000;
00187   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.r += -residual.z/82000;
00188 
00189   // residual FRAC = ACCEL_FRAC + TRIG_FRAC = 10 + 14 = 24
00190   // high_rez_bias = RATE_FRAC+28 = 40
00191   // 2^40 / 2^24 * 5e-6 = 1/3.05
00192 
00193   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.p += residual.x*3;
00194   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.q += residual.y*3;
00195   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.r += residual.z*3;
00196 
00197   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.p += residual.x;
00198   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.q += residual.y;
00199   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.r += residual.z;
00200 
00201 
00202   /*                        */
00203   INT_RATES_RSHIFT(ahrs_impl.gyro_bias, ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, 28);
00204 
00205 
00206 }
00207 
00208 void ahrs_update_mag(void) {
00209 #ifdef AHRS_MAG_UPDATE_YAW_ONLY
00210   ahrs_update_mag_2d();
00211 #else
00212   ahrs_update_mag_full();
00213 #endif
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 static inline void ahrs_update_mag_full(void) {
00218   const struct Int32Vect3 expected_ltp = {MAG_BFP_OF_REAL(AHRS_H_X),
00219             MAG_BFP_OF_REAL(AHRS_H_Y),
00220             MAG_BFP_OF_REAL(AHRS_H_Z)};
00221   struct Int32Vect3 expected_imu;
00222   INT32_RMAT_VMULT(expected_imu, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, expected_ltp);
00223 
00224   struct Int32Vect3 residual;
00225   INT32_VECT3_CROSS_PRODUCT(residual, imu.mag, expected_imu);
00226 
00227   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.p += residual.x/32/16;
00228   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.q += residual.y/32/16;
00229   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.r += residual.z/32/16;
00230 
00231 
00232   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.p += -residual.x/32*1024;
00233   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.q += -residual.y/32*1024;
00234   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.r += -residual.z/32*1024;
00235 
00236 
00237   INT_RATES_RSHIFT(ahrs_impl.gyro_bias, ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, 28);
00238 
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 static inline void ahrs_update_mag_2d(void) {
00243 
00244   const struct Int32Vect2 expected_ltp = {MAG_BFP_OF_REAL(AHRS_H_X),
00245             MAG_BFP_OF_REAL(AHRS_H_Y)};
00246 
00247   struct Int32Vect3 measured_ltp;
00248   INT32_RMAT_TRANSP_VMULT(measured_ltp, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, imu.mag);
00249 
00250   struct Int32Vect3 residual_ltp =
00251     { 0,
00252       0,
00253       (measured_ltp.x * expected_ltp.y - measured_ltp.y * expected_ltp.x)/(1<<5)};
00254 
00255   struct Int32Vect3 residual_imu;
00256   INT32_RMAT_VMULT(residual_imu, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, residual_ltp);
00257 
00258   // residual_ltp FRAC = 2 * MAG_FRAC = 22
00259   // rate_correction FRAC = RATE_FRAC = 12
00260   // 2^12 / 2^22 * 2.5 = 1/410
00261 
00262   //  ahrs_impl.rate_correction.p += residual_imu.x*(1<<5)/410;
00263   //  ahrs_impl.rate_correction.q += residual_imu.y*(1<<5)/410;
00264   //  ahrs_impl.rate_correction.r += residual_imu.z*(1<<5)/410;
00265 
00266   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.p += residual_imu.x/16;
00267   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.q += residual_imu.y/16;
00268   ahrs_impl.rate_correction.r += residual_imu.z/16;
00269 
00270 
00271   // residual_ltp FRAC = 2 * MAG_FRAC = 22
00272   // high_rez_bias = RATE_FRAC+28 = 40
00273   // 2^40 / 2^22 * 2.5e-3 = 655
00274 
00275   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.p -= residual_imu.x*(1<<5)*655;
00276   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.q -= residual_imu.y*(1<<5)*655;
00277   //  ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.r -= residual_imu.z*(1<<5)*655;
00278 
00279   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.p -= residual_imu.x*1024;
00280   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.q -= residual_imu.y*1024;
00281   ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias.r -= residual_imu.z*1024;
00282 
00283 
00284   INT_RATES_RSHIFT(ahrs_impl.gyro_bias, ahrs_impl.high_rez_bias, 28);
00285 
00286 }
00287 
00288 
00289 /* Compute ltp to imu rotation in quaternion and rotation matrice representation
00290    from the euler angle representation */
00291 __attribute__ ((always_inline)) static inline void compute_imu_quat_and_rmat_from_euler(void) {
00292 
00293   /* Compute LTP to IMU quaternion */
00294   INT32_QUAT_OF_EULERS(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_euler);
00295   /* Compute LTP to IMU rotation matrix */
00296   INT32_RMAT_OF_EULERS(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_euler);
00297 
00298 }
00299 
00300 /* Compute ltp to imu rotation in euler angles and rotation matrice representation
00301    from the quaternion representation */
00302 __attribute__ ((always_inline)) static inline void compute_imu_euler_and_rmat_from_quat(void) {
00303 
00304   /* Compute LTP to IMU euler */
00305   INT32_EULERS_OF_QUAT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_euler, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat);
00306   /* Compute LTP to IMU rotation matrix */
00307   INT32_RMAT_OF_QUAT(ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat);
00308 
00309 }
00310 
00311 __attribute__ ((always_inline)) static inline void compute_body_orientation(void) {
00312 
00313   /* Compute LTP to BODY quaternion */
00314   INT32_QUAT_COMP_INV(ahrs.ltp_to_body_quat, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_quat, imu.body_to_imu_quat);
00315   /* Compute LTP to BODY rotation matrix */
00316   INT32_RMAT_COMP_INV(ahrs.ltp_to_body_rmat, ahrs.ltp_to_imu_rmat, imu.body_to_imu_rmat);
00317   /* compute LTP to BODY eulers */
00318   INT32_EULERS_OF_RMAT(ahrs.ltp_to_body_euler, ahrs.ltp_to_body_rmat);
00319   /* compute body rates */
00320   INT32_RMAT_TRANSP_RATEMULT(ahrs.body_rate, imu.body_to_imu_rmat, ahrs.imu_rate);
00321 
00322 }

00325 #ifdef AHRS_UPDATE_FW_ESTIMATOR
00326 // TODO use ahrs result directly
00327 #include "estimator.h"
00328 // remotely settable
00329 #ifndef INS_ROLL_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT
00330 #define INS_ROLL_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT 0
00331 #endif
00332 #ifndef INS_PITCH_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT
00333 #define INS_PITCH_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT 0
00334 #endif
00335 float ins_roll_neutral = INS_ROLL_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT;
00336 float ins_pitch_neutral = INS_PITCH_NEUTRAL_DEFAULT;
00337 void ahrs_update_fw_estimator(void)
00338 {
00339   struct FloatEulers att;
00340   // export results to estimator
00341   EULERS_FLOAT_OF_BFP(att, ahrs.ltp_to_body_euler);
00342 
00343   estimator_phi   = att.phi - ins_roll_neutral;
00344   estimator_theta = att.theta - ins_pitch_neutral;
00345   estimator_psi   = att.psi;
00346 
00347   struct FloatRates rates;
00348   RATES_FLOAT_OF_BFP(rates, ahrs.body_rate);
00349   estimator_p = rates.p;
00350   estimator_q = rates.q;
00351 
00352 }
00353 #endif //AHRS_UPDATE_FW_ESTIMATOR
